title: Logic Pro Kit 5pk
description: Get power and taste satisfaction in a smart format. The Logic Pro eliminates the need for refilling with pre-filled smart capsules. Since each refill is self-contained, you can switch capsules as often as you like. Then thereÂ’s the device itself. Covered in a matte black, soft-touch finish, the Logic Pro offers one-touch operation to bring you vaping satisfaction at the push of a button.  Use only with Logic Pro e-liquid capsules, available in:  Tobacco Menthol Cherry Berry Mint
